description: specification of a horizontal pod autoscaler.

cpuUtilization.description: target average CPU utilization (represented as a percentage of requested CPU) over all the pods; if not specified it defaults to the target CPU utilization at 80% of the requested resources.

maxReplicas.description: upper limit for the number of pods that can be set by the autoscaler; cannot be smaller than MinReplicas.

minReplicas.description: lower limit for the number of pods that can be set by the autoscaler, default 1.

scaleRef.description: reference to Scale subresource; horizontal pod autoscaler will learn the current resource consumption from its status, and will set the desired number of pods by modifying its spec.
